login.title: Sign In
login.text: Sign in to gain access to your garage
login.doNotHaveAccount: I want to create an account

signUp.title: register
signUp.passwordValidation: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least 1 letter and 1 number
signUp.termsAndConditions: I have read and accept the regulations
signUp.signUpResend: The activation link has been sent to {{emailAddress}}
signUp.successSignUp: You have successfully created an account! Check your e-mail and click on the link sent in the message to activate your account

resetPassword.title: Password reset
resetPassword.header: Provide the email for resetting the password
resetPassword.success: We have sent a message to {{email}}. Follow the link sent in the message to reset your password

logout.sureLogout: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
